text: Stanislavski’s system was how Konstantin Stanislavski trained actors. It involves an actor feeling the emotions of his character. This system inspired Stanislavski’s student Lee Strasberg to create method acting, which Strasberg just called The Method. == Other websites == * The Stanislavsky Research Centre at the University of Leeds * The Stanislavski Centre at the Rose Bruford College * Routledge Performance Archive: Stanislavski Category:Performing arts
